errors.invalidParams: The MetaMask Ethereum provider does not support your given parameters. Please use ethereum.send(method: string, params: Array<any>). For more details, see: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1193
errors.unsupportedSync: The MetaMask Web3 object does not support synchronous methods like ${payload.method} without a callback parameter.

warnings.enableDeprecation: MetaMask: ethereum.enable() is deprecated and may be removed in the future. Please use ethereum.send('eth_requestAccounts'). For more details, see: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1102
warnings.signTypedDataDeprecation: MetaMask: ethereum.sendAsync(...) is deprecated and may be removed in the future. Please use ethereum.send(method: string, params: Array<any>). For more details, see: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1193
warnings.sendAsyncDeprecation: MetaMask: This experimental version of eth_signTypedData will be deprecated in the next release in favor of the standard as defined in EIP-712. See https://git.io/fNzPl for more information on the new standard.
warnings.sendSyncDeprecation: MetaMask: ethereum.send(object) is deprecated and will be removed on December 9, 2019. For details, see: TODO: add link
